DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine Preterm Compared Term Infants .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Infants 42 98 day age ( approximately 2 month ) time enrollment . Previous vaccination pneumococcal vaccine , Haemophilus influenzae type B ( Hib ) conjugate vaccine , meningococcal type C conjugate vaccine , diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis , poliovirus vaccine .
